channel.title: Posts on Micro Services
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Micro Services

item.title: chat
item.description: The chat service is an example Micro service which leverages bidirectional streaming, the store and events to build a chat backend.

item.title: etas
item.description: This is the ETAs service. It provides ETAs for single-pickup, multi-dropoff routes.

item.title: feeds
item.description: Designed to populate the posts service with RSS feeds from other blogs.

item.title: geocoding
item.description: The geocoding service provides address to lat lng geocoding as well as the reverse.

item.title: messages
item.description: The messages service is a simplified service for sending messages, much like email.

item.title: notes
item.description: Notes service is an RPC service which offers CRUD for notes.

item.title: places
item.description: The places service stores places of interest by geolocation. Places Service Generated with

item.title: posts
item.description: The post service is responsible for storing and querying posts by their slugs or IDs.

item.title: routing
item.description: The routing service provides point to point directions. Routing Service Readme coming soon.

item.title: tags
item.description: Tag any resource by savin a tag associated with their ID in the tag service.

item.title: users
item.description: A user service for storing accounts and simple auth. Users Service Getting started micro run github.
